author: ranket
title: JP-Regional Revitalization Project
description: Deindustrialization (high aging, depopulation, shortage of engineers in local areas) is serious problem for developed country Japan
solution: We will make acceptance of Cardano based BC technology for local area citizens and government in Japan, which willl extend the ADA use case.
experience: We have already held Cardano BC seminar for local area government and Citizens and already received positive reactions including other area.
